## random port

Generates a random port number

### Synopsis

Generates a random port between 1024 and 65535 by default. You can provide a range, e.g. random port 2000-3000 to generate a port between 2000 and 3000.

```
random port [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for port
```
